buff.kw_des_1: Choose enemy units with the same position number as yours as a priority. If there are no targets that meet this condition, go for the default enemy unit.
buff.kw_des_2: After an ally unit attacks the enemies, the Hero has a chance to deal a Basic Attack to one of the targets at random.
buff.kw_des_3: Debuffs affecting single units taking their action turn (including Stun, Taunt, Silence, Entwine, Confuse, etc.).
buff.kw_des_4: Takes effect when a unit enters the battlefield.
buff.kw_des_5: Takes effect when a unit is slain.
buff.kw_des_6: Halts all actions in preparation of casting a powerful spell. Status persists unless interrupted by Control effects, or when channeling is complete.
buff.kw_des_7: Directly kills enemies with HP below a certain threshold. Ineffective against elite enemies.
buff.kw_des_8: After an enemy attack, the Hero has a chance to deal a Basic Attack to their attacker.
buff.buff_des_101: Each stack deals damage equal to 12% of the ally team's average ATK every round.
buff.buff_des_102: Each stack deals damage based on the target's Max HP every round. Stacks up to 5 times.
buff.buff_des_152: Increases DMG Boost. Restores HP after taking action.
buff.buff_des_201: A Control effect that cannot be purified. Immobilizes targets.
buff.buff_des_202: A Control effect. Taunted unit is restricted to only dealing Basic Attacks against the Taunting unit.
buff.buff_des_203: A Control effect that restricts the use of active skills (except for Basic Attacks).
buff.buff_des_204: A Control effect that immobilizes targets.
buff.buff_des_205: Units cannot be revived if slain during Soulseal.
buff.buff_des_206: A Control effect that restricts critical hits. Passive skills are also nullified.
buff.buff_des_207: A Control effect that forces the affected target to launch indiscriminate basic attacks on random units.
buff.buff_des_208: A Control effect with a 50% chance to immobilize the affected target.
buff.buff_des_209: A Control effect with a 50% chance to force the affected target to attack Confuse's caster or a random ally unit with an Basic Attack.
buff.buff_des_210: Affected target is immobilized. This effect cannot be purified.
buff.buff_des_211: Halts all actions in preparation of casting a powerful magic spell. Status persists unless interrupted by Control effects, or when channeling is complete. This effect cannot be dispelled.
buff.buff_des_213: Unable to heal the target during a Healing Ban.
buff.buff_des_301:
Absorbs DMG in place of HP.
 (Remaining Shield Points: <color=@000083>{0}</color>)
buff.buff_des_302: While Fortitude is active, the target is protected for a minimum of 1 HP when DMG is taken. This effect can be dispelled.
buff.buff_des_302_1: While Fortitude is active, the target retains a minimum of 1 HP regardless of the amount of DMG taken. This effect cannot be dispelled.
buff.buff_des_303: Elune's active skills will prioritize Hunt targets. Cannot be purified.
buff.buff_des_304: Grants immunity to subsequent debuffs that can be Purified.
buff.buff_des_305: After using an attack skill, the affected unit will take DMG equal to 50% of the ATK of Devour's caster.
buff.buff_des_306: When the target is attacked, the damage is shared with the unit that applied Protect.
buff.buff_des_307: Immune to Control effects. Cannot be dispelled.
buff.buff_des_307_1: Grants immunity to Control effects, with the exception of effects that cannot be Purified. This effect cannot be dispelled.
buff.buff_des_308: Prevents new buffs, with the exception of effects that cannot be Purified.
buff.buff_des_309_1: Grants immunity to Soulseal. This effect cannot be dispelled.
buff.buff_des_312: A mark. Marked units are attacked first.
buff.buff_des_313: A holy shield. Each stack can block 1 instance of damage.
buff.buff_des_401: This buff takes priority when absorbing DMG taken by allied Heroes.

buff.buff_des_4027: Reduces targets' DMG RED. Duplicate effects will assume the highest value.

buff.buff_des_5001: Increases Final DMG dealt by basic attacks and skills to their targets. DMG boost is equal to 15% of the caster's ATK. Stacks up to 5 times.
buff.buff_des_130010: Increases DMG. Carries an HP On Kill effect.
buff.buff_des_140020: The unit signed a pledge with the Moira of Demiseâ€”Atropos, increasing the unit's own ATK using 40% of Atropos's ATK as a base.
buff.buff_des_229810: When attacked, receive additional damage equal to 20% of Stannard's ATK.
buff.buff_des_220011: Increases ATK. Stacks up to 8 times.
buff.buff_des_230020: Become Elune's marked target. ATK gets leeched and damage taken from other units is reduced by 10%.
buff.buff_des_220040: Reduces CRIT RES Rate and Dodge Rate.
buff.buff_des_420010: Reduces DMG Boost by 5%. Converts into Storm Energy at the end of an action turn. Cannot be dispelled.
buff.buff_des_420011: Storm energy gathered by Talanis. Cannot be dispelled.
buff.buff_des_430021: The unit has gathered 5% of their ATK onto Hallios.
buff.buff_des_439810: Reduces Dodge Rate. Stacks up to 3 times.
buff.buff_des_449800: Increases Cure Rate. Cannot be stacked.
buff.buff_des_539810: Greatly increases SPD and CRIT Rate. Cannot be stacked.
buff.buff_des_520020: Reduces Control RES by 10%. Loses 5% of Max HP at the end of the action turn. Cannot be dispelled.
buff.buff_des_5400401: Increases DMG Boost. Restores HP right before the end of each action.
buff.buff_des_519901: Greatly increases caster's PDEF and MDEF. Cannot be stacked.

buff.buff_des_7160302: Each stack deals damage equal to 1.5% of the target's Max HP every round. Cannot exceed 30% of Relic Skill DMG. Stacks up to 5 times.

buff.buff_des_7160400: Receives Relic Healing each time critical damage is taken. Cannot be dispelled.
buff.buff_des_7160410: Increases CRIT DMG RES. Receives Relic Healing each time critical damage is taken. Cannot be dispelled.
